card.name: Gilford the Legend
card.description: Cannot be Special Summoned. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can equip as many Equip Spell Cards from your Graveyard as possible to a Warrior-Type monster(s) you control.

card.name: Warrior Lady of the Wasteland
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH Warrior-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck, in face-up Attack Position.

card.name: Dark Blade
card.description: They say he is a dragon-manipulating warrior from the dark world. His attack is tremendous, using his great swords with vicious power.

card.name: Goblin Attack Force
card.description: If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase, and its battle position cannot be changed until the End Phase of your next turn.

card.name: Gearfried the Iron Knight
card.description: If either player equips an Equip Card(s) to this card: Destroy that Equip Card(s).

card.name: Swift Gaia the Fierce Knight
card.description: If this is the only card in your hand, you can Normal Summon it without Tributing.

card.name: Obnoxious Celtic Guard
card.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has 1900 or more ATK.

card.name: Command Knight
card.description: All Warrior monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If you control another monster, monsters your opponent controls cannot target this card for attacks.

card.name: Marauding Captain
card.description: Your opponent cannot target Warrior monsters for attacks, except this one. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

card.name: Exiled Force
card.description: You can Tribute this card to target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: D.D. Warrior Lady
card.description: After damage calculation, when this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that monster, also banish this card.

card.name: Mataza the Zapper
card.description: This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. Control of this face-up card on the field cannot switch.

card.name: Mystic Swordsman LV2
card.description: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacked a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV4" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Mystic Swordsman LV4
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned (but can be Normal Set). At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacked a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV6" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Ninja Grandmaster Sasuke
card.description: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-up Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster.

card.name: Gearfried the Swordmaster
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Release Restraint". Each time an Equip Card(s) is equipped to this card: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Armed Samurai - Ben Kei
card.description: For each Equip Card equipped to this card, it gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase.

card.name: Divine Sword - Phoenix Blade
card.description: Equip only to a Warrior monster. It gains 300 ATK. During your Main Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can banish 2 Warrior monsters from your GY; add this card to your hand.

card.name: Snatch Steal
card.description: Equip only to a monster your opponent controls. Take control of the equipped monster. During each of your opponent's Standby Phases: They gain 1000 Life Points.

card.name: Mystical Space Typhoon
card.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Giant Trunade
card.description: Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the hand.

card.name: Lightning Blade
card.description: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 800 ATK. All WATER monsters lose 500 ATK.

card.name: Heavy Storm
card.description: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

card.name: Reinforcement of the Army
card.description: Add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand.

card.name: The Warrior Returning Alive
card.description: Target 1 Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

card.name: Fusion Sword Murasame Blade
card.description: Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 800 ATK. While equipped to a monster, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects.

card.name: Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou
card.description: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 monster on the field; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK. Negate the effects of opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with the equipped monster.

card.name: Fairy of the Spring
card.description: Target 1 Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand. That Equip Spell Card cannot be activated this turn.

card.name: Reload
card.description: Add all cards in your hand to your Deck and shuffle it. Then draw the same number of cards that you added to your Deck.

card.name: Lightning Vortex
card.description: Discard 1 card; destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

card.name: Swords of Concealing Light
card.description: Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation. When this card resolves, change all monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position. Monsters your opponent controls cannot change their battle positions.

card.name: Release Restraint
card.description: Tribute 1 "Gearfried the Iron Knight"; Special Summon 1 "Gearfried the Swordmaster" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Call of the Haunted
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.

card.name: Magic Jammer
card.description: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card.name: Royal Decree
card.description: Negate all other Trap effects on the field.

card.name: Blast with Chain
card.description: Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target. It gains 500 ATK. If this card is destroyed by a card effect while equipped: Target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.
